title: Bit_Happy
author: Bit_Happy
content: [ANN] Positive Coin (+++) A Fun Project Which Is Honestly Hard To Say Anything Negative About. Positive Coin* Positive Coin will be an independent blockchain, related to a Massive New Network of projects called Ten Seeds.* Positive Token (Not yet announced) Many of you know, it is common these days for assets to place their value on more than one network (i.e.) ETH and Polygon is a popular example. Our early-seed participants will benefit from a "planned, early fork/split" of the positive project. All the early-seed Positive Coin value you hold at the time of the split will be doubled when the Token goes live.That's it for now, nice and brief. FYI: We have the Genesis of our Ten Seeds ecosystem up and running Live.[align=center][/align]The Current Ten Seeds EcosystemOur Current Ten Seeds Ecosystem is only a small part of a much bigger picture. It can be a challenge to teach people things which are "ahead of the curve", but we will be the source of many fun surprises this holiday season. When I finally do make a breakthrough, finding the right people who can see what is being offered, then Almost Anything Is Possible.[ANN] ANN Party: Fun + Blockchains = A Massive Source Of New WealthAnn Party has never been seen anywhere before, you are literally the first. Positive Coin and the Massive Ten Seeds Network have exactly what you need.The Time To Be Bold Is Now!"Fortune favors the bold means that taking risks and being courageous can bring you success, good luck, or whatever equivalent you're after." ~ grammarist.com Thank you for a small amount of your time today. This was a really brief intro to the potential of Positive Coin.Blockchain BuzzwordsBlockchain Buzzwords can be found in my much longer post, where we are having Satoshi Day! for Ten Seeds and several of the projects. In that Epic thread you will find a plan for massive new wealth with literally No Competition. Making a large amount of Fun, Honest Money is much easier when you enjoy having No Competition. In the longer thread I mention seeking ~10 Founders/early partners, instead of only one. Since many people are "sheep", and need to see others moving first, I am open to sharing Positive Coin and several other projects with only one or two early founders/Big Players.Brand New Coupon Code  SB7J72WSThe first two brave people to use that coupon on a Founders upgrade will never forget how much this moment changed your life. Welcome to 2048: The World's First Long-Term, Paid Study of Bitcoin Users.  // Ten Seeds Network, ANN Party, Today!
